entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
